steps.title: Launch the Hearthfire add-on.
steps.content: Launch the Hearthfire add-on. A messenger will deliver a letter that informs you of land available for purchase.

steps.title: Travel to the Jarl’s Hall in Dawnstar, Falkreath or Morthal.
steps.content: Travel to the Jarl’s Hall in Dawnstar, Falkreath or Morthal. These cities are home to Jarls who will sell you plots of land. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Speak to the Jarl.
steps.content: Speak to the Jarl. The Jarl will assign you a quest that must be fulfilled before you can purchase land. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Complete the quest assigned by the Jarl.
steps.content: Complete the quest assigned by the Jarl. The tasks are different depending on your city. For example, if speaking to the Jarl in Falkreath, you’ll be required to kill the bandit leader at Bilegulch Mine. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Return to the Jarl after completing the quest.
steps.content: Return to the Jarl after completing the quest. The Jarl will name you Thane, which gives you rights to purchase land under the Jarl’s jurisdiction.

steps.title: Select the option to ask the Jarl about land for sale.
steps.content: Select the option to ask the Jarl about land for sale. The Jarl will arrange for you to speak with his steward to complete the sale.

steps.title: Inform the steward you want to purchase a house.
steps.content: Inform the steward you want to purchase a house. The cost to buy land is 5,000 gold pieces.

steps.title: Select the option to purchase land.
steps.content: Select the option to purchase land. The steward will give you the deed to your land.

steps.title: Use your map to navigate to the plot of land purchased from the Jarl.
steps.content: Use your map to navigate to the plot of land purchased from the Jarl. When you arrive, a set of tools and instructions will be available. You can now build homes and adopt children under the Hearthfire expansion.
